title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: local Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, Phi-3 & 30+ GGUF models wrapped in a single Go CLI with OpenAI-compatible REST endpoints.

title: ollama/ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for the Ollama API—works in Node and browsers.

title: ollama/ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama; chat, generate, embed, pull models with a few lines.

title: jmorganca/ollama-inspector
summary: Lightweight web UI to browse and chat with models managed by Ollama.

title: ollama-webui/ollama-webui
summary: Full-featured ChatGPT-like web interface for Ollama with multi-user support, model management, and code-syntax highlighting.

title: richawo/ollama-cli-chat
summary: Terminal UI (TUI) chat client for Ollama written in Go; feels like IRC for local LLMs.

title: thomas-mckenna/ollama-discord
summary: Discord bot that forwards user prompts to your local Ollama instance and streams replies.

title: kevinwuhoo/ollama-slack
summary: Slack bot integration for Ollama—mention the bot in any channel to chat with a local model.

title: langchain-ai/langchain-community
summary: LangChain Ollama LLM & chat integrations enabling Retrieval, Agents, Tools, etc.

title: embedchain/embedchain
summary: RAG framework with built-in Ollama support—ingest docs, query with local models.

title: harrywang/ollama-rag
summary: Minimal Streamlit app showing RAG with Ollama + ChromaDB + LangChain.

title: sugarforever/ollama-whisper
summary: Voice chat with Ollama: Whisper transcribes audio, Ollama answers, Edge-TTS speaks back.

title: richawo/ollama-coder
summary: VS Code extension that uses Ollama for inline code completion and refactoring suggestions.

title: continuedev/continue
summary: VS Code/JetBrains code-assistant plugin; Ollama is a first-class provider for local code completion and chat.

title: ollama/ollama-accelerator-examples
summary: Reference Dockerfiles and scripts to run Ollama on GPU-enabled containers (CUDA, ROCm).

title: ggerganov/llama.cpp
summary: Core GGML/GGUF inference engine that Ollama bundles; track latest quantization formats.

title: reddit/r/ollama
summary: Active subreddit for model announcements, troubleshooting and showcase projects.

title: npm: ollama
summary: Official Ollama JS client package on npm—40k weekly downloads.

title: PyPI: ollama
summary: Official Python package on PyPI—60k monthly downloads.

title: Hacker News: Show HN: I built a ChatGPT clone that runs entirely locally with Ollama
summary: Show HN discussion on a self-contained Tauri+React app that bundles Ollama for offline chat.
